key.name: dsn
key.description:
The PostgreSQL data source name. For example:
dsn dbname='template1' user='user' host='localhost' password='pass'
If dsn is omitted, the adapter will connect to a local database with no password. Both the user and database name will match the name of the owner of the current process.

key.name: database-name
key.description: The name given to this database in the multi-database collection. The name must be unique across all databases in the collection.

key.name: lock-table
key.description: The name of the table to lock before changing any text index in this database. This lock prevents most commit failures.
